title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Create a new data source and dataset. 
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. 

Observed Behavior: 
- The expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the aliases when selecting the dataset. 

Expected Behavior: 
- The expression builder should show the aliases of the columns when selecting the dataset.
